description: pfSense metrics from InfluxDB using Telegraf service

targets.query: SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "cpu" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host
